languages.text: "Мы выглядим, говорим и двигаемся иначе, чем представители планетарных миров. Наш образ жизни, традиции и привычки пугают людей не меньше, чем сама темнота космоса. Многие считают нас вестниками неудач и, к сожалению, во время самых непростых перелетов нередко винят именно пустотнорожденных в жутких событиях, навеянных варпом".

traits.locale_text: "Мы выглядим, говорим и двигаемся иначе, чем представители планетарных миров. Наш образ жизни, традиции и привычка к варп-аномалиям пугает людей не меньше, чем сама темнота космоса. Многие считают нас вестниками неудач и, к сожалению, во время самых непростых перелетов нередко винят именно пустотников в жутких событиях, навеянных варпом".

languages.text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."
languages.original_text: "Мы выглядим, говорим и двигаемся иначе, чем представители планетарных миров. Наш образ жизни, традиции и привычки пугают людей не меньше, чем сама темнота космоса. Многие считают нас вестниками неудач и, к сожалению, во время самых непростых перелетов нередко винят именно пустотнорожденных в жутких событиях, навеянных варпом".

traits.locale_text: "We look, speak and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions and quirks frighten these men just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas! It is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible Warp phenomena during the longer journeys."

"We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

"We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

"We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

languages.text: «Nuestro aspecto, nuestra habla y nuestros movimientos son diferentes a los de los habitantes de los diferentes mundos. Nuestra forma de vivir, nuestras tradiciones y nuestras peculiaridades asustan a esta gente tanto como la oscuridad del cosmos. Muchos consideran que somos presagio de mala fortuna y lamentablemente acusan a los nacidos del vacío de ser causantes de los terribles fenómenos de disformidad que acechan en los viajes más largos».
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro aspecto, nuestra habla y nuestros movimientos son diferentes a los de los habitantes de los diferentes mundos. Nuestra forma de vivir, nuestras tradiciones y nuestras peculiaridades asustan a esta gente tanto como la oscuridad del cosmos. Muchos consideran que somos presagio de mala fortuna y lamentablemente acusan a los nacidos del vacío de ser causantes de los terribles fenómenos de disformidad que acechan en los viajes más largos».

languages.text: “我们的外表、语言与行动方式与行星世界的居民截然不同。对那些人而言，我们的生活方式、传统与癖好就仿佛宇宙中的黑暗一样，会让他们感到恐惧。许多人认为我们会招致厄运。遗憾的是，在漫长的航程中，一旦亚空间航行出现了事故，虚空之子总会被拉出来当替罪羊。”
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: “我们的外表、语言与行动方式与行星世界的居民截然不同。对那些人而言，我们的生活方式、传统与癖好就仿佛宇宙中的黑暗一样，会让他们感到恐惧。许多人认为我们会招致厄运。遗憾的是，在漫长的航程中，一旦亚空间航行出现了事故，虚空之子总会被拉出来当替罪羊。”

languages.text: 「私達の見る・話す・動くは、惑星の民とは異なります。こちらの生活スタイル、伝統、習慣は、宇宙の暗闇のように、惑星の民達を怖がらせるのです。多くの者達が虚空生まれは不幸を運ぶと信じており、悲しいかな、長い航海中に恐ろしい歪み現象で責められるのは虚空生まれの私達です」
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: 「私達の見る・話す・動くは、惑星の民とは異なります。こちらの生活スタイル、伝統、習慣は、宇宙の暗闇のように、惑星の民達を怖がらせるのです。多くの者達が虚空生まれは不幸を運ぶと信じており、悲しいかな、長い航海中に恐ろしい歪み現象で責められるのは虚空生まれの私達です」

languages.text: "Wir sehen anders aus als die Einwohner der Planetenwelten, sprechen anders und bewegen uns anders. Unsere Lebensart, Traditionen und Eigenarten ängstigen diese Leute ebenso wie die Dunkelheit des Kosmos. Viele glauben, wir brächten Unglück, und leider wird immer den Kindern der Leere die Schuld zugesprochen, wenn auf längeren Reisen schlimme Warp-Phänomene auftreten."
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sehen anders aus als die Einwohner der Planetenwelten, sprechen anders und bewegen uns anders. Unsere Lebensart, Traditionen und Eigenarten ängstigen diese Leute ebenso wie die Dunkelheit des Kosmos. Viele glauben, wir brächten Unglück, und leider wird immer den Kindern der Leere die Schuld zugesprochen, wenn auf längeren Reisen schlimme Warp-Phänomene auftreten."

languages.text: « Nous différons des habitants des mondes planétaires aussi bien par notre apparence que par notre façon de parler et même de nous déplacer. Notre mode de vie, nos traditions et nos particularités effraient ces gens tout autant que les ténèbres du cosmos. Beaucoup pensent que les hors-monde portent malheur et, hélas, nous sommes souvent tenus pour responsables des accidents tragiques qui surviennent parfois lors des longs voyages dans le Warp. »
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: « Nous différons des habitants des mondes planétaires aussi bien par notre apparence que par notre façon de parler et même de nous déplacer. Notre mode de vie, nos traditions et nos particularités effraient ces gens tout autant que les ténèbres du cosmos. Beaucoup pensent que les hors-monde portent malheur et, hélas, nous sommes souvent tenus pour responsables des accidents tragiques qui surviennent parfois lors des longs voyages dans le Warp. »

languages.text: "Gezegen dünyalarında doğup büyüyenlerden farklı görünür, konuşur ve hareket ederiz. Yaşam tarzımız, geleneklerimiz ve huylarımız; bu insanları kainatın karanlığı gibi korkutur. Birçokları bizim uğursuzluk getirdiğimize inanır ve ne yazık ki uzun yolculuklar sırasında gerçekleşen korkunç öteboyut fenomenlerinin suçu, hep uçsuzdoğanların üstüne yıkılır."
languages.original_text: "We look, speak, and move differently from the inhabitants of the planetary worlds. Our way of life, traditions, and quirks frighten these people just like the darkness of the cosmos. Many believe us to be the bringers of ill fortune, and alas, it is the voidborn who get the blame for terrible warp phenomena during longer voyages."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen dünyalarında doğup büyüyenlerden farklı görünür, konuşur ve hareket ederiz. Yaşam tarzımız, geleneklerimiz ve huylarımız bu insanları kainatın karanlığı gibi korkutur. Birçokları bizim uğursuzluk getirdiğimize inanır ve ne yazık ki uzun yolculuklar sırasında gerçekleşen korkunç öteboyut fenomenlerinin suçu hep uçsuzdoğanların üstüne yıkılır."
